name: Pattern Dancer

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
text: The shadow fey has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

trait.name: Shadow Traveler (1/Day)
text: As a bonus action while in shadows, dim light, or darkness, the shadow fey disappears into the darkness and reappears in an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet. A tendril of inky smoke appears at the origin and destination when it uses this trait.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
text: While in sunlight, the shadow fey has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Traveler In Darkness
text: The shadow fey has advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks made to know about shadow roads and shadow magic spells or items.

trait.name: Group Actions
text: When three pattern dancers are within 60 feet of each other,
they can work together to cast communal spells that are more
powerful than they could cast individually. To do this, one takes
an action to cast a spell, and the other two must use their
reactions to complete it. These spells are listed in innate spellcasting.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The pattern dancer's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells:
At will: hold person
3/day each: fear, sleep
1/day each: confusion, hypnotic pattern

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: The pattern dancer is a -level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The pattern dancer has the following Wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, friends, minor illusion, poison spray
• 1st level (4 slots): color spray, disguise self, magic missile, shield
• 2nd level (3 slots): blur, mirror image
• 3rd level (2 slots): major image, nondetection

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

spells: hold person, fear, sleep, confusion, hypnotic pattern, dancing lights, friends, minor illusion, poison spray, color spray, disguise self, magic missile, shield, blur, mirror image, major image, nondetection
